name: 机械风暴丨MG_jixie
description:
基于厚涂风格训练的机械模型，适用性较广，可以生成人物、枪械、机甲和机械类型的工具等。

搭配不同大模型有不同的风格，建议搭配 AWPainting 会有较好的表现。通过测试还可以将图片内容细化增添机械元素，使人物肢体或配饰增加机械元素；生成人物时请降低权重。

Steps:20~30    推荐:原生训练768*1024  Sampler：DPM++2MKarras

Prompts：machinery, Mecha, 1girl, solo, from side, long hair, profile, upper body, science fiction, closed mouth, white hair, headgear, Technological background，

Neg_Prompts: (worst quality:2, low quality:2),(zombie, sketch, interlocked fingers, comic),Holding something in hand,with extra fingers and arms,2face,two girl,

欢迎各位积极返图和评论

The mechanical model trained based on thick coating style has a wide applicability and can generate characters, firearms, mecha, and mechanical tools.

Pairing with different large models has different styles, and it is recommended to pair with AWPainting for better performance. Through testing, it is possible to refine the image content and add mechanical elements to the character's limbs or accessories; Please reduce the weight when generating characters.

Steps: 20-30 Recommendation: Native training 768 * 1024 Sampler: DPM++2MKarras

Prompts: machinery, Mecha, 1Girl, solo, from side, long hair, profile, upper body, science fit, closed mouth, white hair, headgear, technical background,

Neg_ Prompts: (best quality: 2, low quality: 2), (zombie, sketch, interlocked fingers, comic), Holding something in hand, with extra fingers and arms, 2face, two girls,

Welcome everyone to actively return pictures and comments

抖音和小红书同名，不定时更新关于一些ai的探索和图片分享

爱发电可以请我喝杯奶茶：https://afdian.net/a/mango_AI

小红书：mango

商业合作联系：V1643459514
